title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge Lambda with Hono: The lightweight web framework (CNS374)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Hono 增强 Lambda：轻量级 Web 框架 (CNS374)
abstract: Enhance your Lambda development experience with Hono, a TypeScript-friendly framework that brings familiar web patterns to serverless functions. This lightweight framework enables clean, intuitive routing while leveraging Lambda's full scalability potential. This lightning talk demonstrates how Hono's unified router simplifies development, reduces cold-start times, and complements existing AWS tooling. Through live examples, you'll learn practical patterns for building maintainable, production-grade APIs that enhance developer experience without compromising performance.
abstract_cn: 使用 Hono 增强您的 Lambda 开发体验，这是一个对 TypeScript 友好的框架，为无服务器函数带来了熟悉的 Web 模式。这个轻量级框架实现了简洁直观的路由，同时充分利用 Lambda 的可扩展性潜力。本闪电演讲展示了 Hono 的统一路由器如何简化开发、减少冷启动时间，并与现有的 AWS 工具相辅相成。通过实时示例，您将学习构建可维护的生产级 API 的实用模式，在不影响性能的情况下提升开发者体验。
